title: Herb Lester Associates
description: Fiction, reality and the otherworldly co-exist in Herb Lester's universe. Our illustrated maps have documented the distinctive in the world's great cities, as well as charting locations associated with literature, rock'n'roll, the occult and wider pop culture.
cleaned_text: Welcome to our world. Our illustrated guides document the distinctive in the world's great cities, as well as charting locations associated with literature, rock'n'roll, the occult and wider pop culture. While our notepads from fictional hotels make ideal souvenirs from places no one can visit. Current best sellers - [Lamb's London](/products/lambs-london) £12.00
